p: In the CCT among patients with colorectal adenoma treated with Ganoderma lucidum adverse events were noted in six out of 123 patients in the verum group ( Oka et al., 2010). Symptoms were diarrhea (n = 4), stomach discomfort (n = 1) and poor health (n = 1). Treatment with the verum was discontinued in all cases. No adverse events were reported for the placebo group (n = 102).
